definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: The results obtained from the experiments show that the most favorable decoloring agent is powder active carbon.
sentences.chinese: 實驗表明，粉狀炭作爲脫色劑具有更大的優越性。

sentences.english: Monobenzyl ether of hydroquinone (MBEH) is the most widely used depigmenting agent and has few side-effects.
sentences.chinese: 莫諾苯宗是使用最廣泛的脫色劑，並且副作用少。
